name: ccl-test-data
description: This directory contains language-agnostic test cases for CCL (Categorical Configuration Language) parsers organized by architectural level.

scripts.validate: ajv validate -s tests/schema.json -d 'tests/comments.json' -d 'tests/comprehensive-parsing.json' -d 'tests/dotted-keys.json' -d 'tests/errors.json' -d 'tests/essential-parsing.json' -d 'tests/object-construction.json' -d 'tests/processing.json' -d 'tests/typed-access.json' --verbose && cd tests && ajv validate -s pretty-print-schema.json -r schema.json -d pretty-print.json --verbose
scripts.validate:pretty-print: cd tests && ajv validate -s pretty-print-schema.json -r schema.json -d pretty-print.json --verbose
scripts.test: npm run validate && npm run docs:check
